facts.fact_text: Construction output in the Czech Republic rose by 5.3% year-on-year in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: Construction output in the Czech Republic rose by 5.3% year-on-year in December 2025

facts.fact_text: Growth slowed sharply in building constructions to 2.3% in December from 8.1% in November.

evidences.evidence_text: Growth slowed sharply in building constructions (2.3% vs 8.1% in November).

facts.fact_text: Output grew in civil engineering works by 10.9% in December, compared to 3.3% in November.

evidences.evidence_text: Meanwhile, output grew in civil engineering works (10.9% vs 3.3%).

facts.fact_text: The approximate value of building permits granted surged by 54.7% year-on-year to CZK 36 billion in December.

evidences.evidence_text: The approximate value of building permits granted surged by 54.7% year-on-year to CZK 36 billion in December.

facts.fact_text: The number of dwellings increased by 11.2% to 2,774.

evidences.evidence_text: Additionally, the number of dwellings, such as family houses and multi-dwelling buildings, increased by 11.2% to 2,774
while completed dwellings jumped by 56.1% to 2,988.

facts.fact_text: On a monthly basis, construction activity increased by 1.7%.

evidences.evidence_text: On a monthly basis, construction activity increased by 1.7%, following a flat reading in the preceding period.

evidence.evidence_text: Czech Construction Output Growth Slows in December
The approximate value of building permits granted surged by 54.7% year-on-year
